name: Happy Camper: Unidentified Audio Phenomenon
description:
*WINDOWS ONLY*

The UFO will attack and move based off the audio you are listening to. Take photos, cover distance, and avoid getting abducted to earn more points! Each run will end when the player is abducted, killed, or the audio clip ends.

(Player)

W: Forward

S: Backward

D: Right

A: Left

Space: Jump

Left Shift: Run

Q: Flashlight

(Camera)

Hold Right Mouse Button: Aim Camera

Left Mouse Click While Aiming: Takes Photo

Scroll Wheel Down 3X While Not Aiming: Reloads Photo
